channel.title: [PI] Shop not working.... Nees help wery much!
channel.description:
Hi,i trying to add a shop,i using I Van I toturial,but it's not working... I add this to shops.cfg: [img]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/1522/36717414.png[/img] [code]shop = 20 Donator_Store 2 2 6665 200 6666 200 6654 200 6655 200 6656 200 10806 200 6858 200 1053 10 1055 10 1057 10 1037 10 1052 10[/code]
Now i add this code to npc2.py: [img]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/6727/61521813.png[/img] [code]def npcClick1_213(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(20)[/code]
I save it and compile it, compiler don't found errors. I go to the server and try to talk whit npc but he don't open the shop... What i do wrong?

item.title: [PI] Shop not working.... Nees help wery much!
item.dc:creator: @aivaroza4 aivaroza4
item.description:
@aivaroza4 wrote:

Hi,i trying to add a shop,i using I Van I toturial,but it’s not working…
I add this to shops.cfg:

shop = 20	Donator_Store	2	2	6665	200	6666	200	6654	200	6655	200	6656	200	10806	200	6858	200	1053	10	1055	10	1057	10	1037	10	1052	10

Now i add this code to npc2.py:

def npcClick1_213(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(20)

I save it and compile it, compiler don’t found errors.
I go to the server and try to talk whit npc but he don’t open the shop…
What i do wrong?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Shop not working.... Nees help wery much!
